name: CatchYourself
description: Catch yourself! it's a platform game where the playable character suffers a dissociation and his duality escapes him. His objective is to recover it. Armed with nothing but his own peace of mind, in the form of "chakra" power-ups, he will have to defeat his evil self who try to hinder his mission. DESARROLLADORES: Claudio Oulego. Nadia Irene Rey. Pablo Vallejos. Manuel Sánchez. Marcos Aragona. Leandro Arriola. Marianela Raven Velardez.
